faq.doesMiznexMenuWork: Does the Miznex menu work on all devices?
faq.yesOurMenusAreFullyResponsive: Yes. Our menus are fully responsive and work perfectly on Android, iOS, and desktop.
faq.isCodingRequiredToUse: Is coding required to use Miznex?
faq.noProgrammingKnowledgeRequired: No, using Mizenex does not require any programming knowledge.
faq.ifWeUpdateMenu: If we update the menu, will the QR code change?
faq.qrRemainsSameOnMenuUpdate: No, the QR code remains the same and only the menu content is updated.
faq.qrChangeOnMenuDelete: If we delete the menu, does the QR code change?
faq.qrInactiveOnMenuDeletion: If the menu is completely deleted, the QR code will no longer be active.
